import React,{Fragment}from "react" import titles from "../static/css/playdetail.module.css" import CreateTime from "../component/createtime" import {NavLink} from "react-router-dom" export default function DetailTitle(props){ console.log(props) //拿取父组件传递的信息，分离需要信息 let {data} = props return( {data?

{data.name}

{data.creator.nickname}   2020-3-1 创建
播放
({String(data.playCount).slice(0,4)})
({String(data.shareCount).slice(0,4)})
({String(data.commentCount).slice(0,4)})
标签： {data.tags.map((item,index)=>{ return {item} })}

介绍： {`${data.description}`}

:""} ) }
